recipesJson.name: Wild Strawberry freshly picked
recipesJson.author: Hans_Dampft
recipesJson.description:
Just a wild strawberry, Nothing fancy - of course you can add some cream if you desire.

BF/INW Wild Strawberry are good flavors on their own, but each of them has their edges. Both mixed together create a very intense and realistic wild strawberry taste. 
Freshly mixed INW Wild Strawberry is a quite harsh vape. 3 days steeping is required to mellow out the harshness.

FLV Alpine strawberry just tops and prolongs the taste of the wild strawberry.

If you like you can add some EM, sweetener  or creams - enjoy
